SELECT a.*, u.id AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", c.name AS "createBy.company.name", o.name AS "createBy.office.name" FROM sys_log a JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by JOIN sys_office c ON c.id = u.company_id JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u.office_id WHERE a.create_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND u.name LIKE '%'||#{createBy.name}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{createBy.name}, '%')
AND a.request_uri LIKE '%'||#{requestUri}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{requestUri}, '%')
AND a.type = #{TYPE_EXCEPTION}
AND a.title = '系统登录'
AND a.title = '系统登出'
AND a.title != '系统登出' AND a.title != '系统登录' AND a.type=1
AND a.type='2'
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
